description: Response to the Office of the Deputy Prime Minister's Consultation. I. Reforming the home buying and selling process in England and Wales: contents of the Home Information Pack. 7 p. II. The Home Information Pack draft regulations. 4 p. III. Select Committee of the Office of Deputy Prime Minister: housing, planning, local government and the regions. Pre legislative scrutiny of the draft housing bill, memorandum from the Environment agency. 3 p.
department: Dept for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
